flavorText:
"Throw the bodies out. They'll just weigh down the frame."
—Rolf, Argivian mechanic

foreignData.flavorText:
„Entfernt die Gefallenen, sie sind unnötiger Ballast."
—Rolf, Argivischer Mechaniker
foreignData.name: Ausbessern und aufladen
foreignData.text: Bringe eine Artefakt-, Verzauberungs- oder Planeswalkerkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück. Erzeuge einen getappten Kraftstein-Spielstein. (Er ist ein Artefakt mit „{T}: Erzeuge {C}. Dieses Mana kann nicht ausgegeben werden, um einen Nichtartefakt-Zauberspruch zu wirken.")

foreignData.flavorText:
"Echen fuera los cadáveres o hundirán la estructura".
—Rolf, mecánico argiviano
foreignData.name: Reparar y recargar
foreignData.text: Regresa la carta de artefacto, encantamiento o planeswalker objetivo de tu cementerio al campo de batalla. Crea una ficha de Piedra de poder girada. (Es un artefacto con "{T}: Agrega {C}. Este maná no se puede usar para lanzar hechizos que no sean de artefacto".)

foreignData.flavorText:
« Balancez les cadavres. Ils ne font qu'alourdir l'appareil. »
—Rolf, mécanicien argivian
foreignData.name: Réparation et recharge
foreignData.text: Renvoyez sur le champ de bataille, depuis votre cimetière, une carte d'artefact, d'enchantement ou de planeswalker ciblée. Créez un jeton Lithoforce engagé. (C'est un artefact avec « {T} : Ajoutez {C}. Ce mana ne peut pas être dépensé pour lancer un sort non-artefact. »)

foreignData.flavorText:
"Dobbiamo disfarci dei cadaveri. Saranno soltanto un peso."
—Rolf, meccanico di Argivia
foreignData.name: Riparare e Ricaricare
foreignData.text: Rimetti sul campo di battaglia una carta artefatto, incantesimo o planeswalker bersaglio dal tuo cimitero. Crea una pedina Pietra del Potere TAPpata. (È un artefatto con "{T}: Aggiungi {C}. Questo mana non può essere speso per lanciare una magia non artefatto".)

foreignData.flavorText:
「死体を捨てろ。躯体の重荷になるだけだ。」
――アルガイヴの整備士、ロルフ
foreignData.name: 修復と充電
foreignData.text: あなたの墓地にありアーティファクトやエンチャントやプレインズウォーカーであるカードのうち１枚を対象とする。それを戦場に戻す。パワーストーン・トークン１つをタップ状態で生成する。（それは、「{T}：{C}を加える。このマナはアーティファクトでない呪文を唱えるためには支払えない。」を持つアーティファクトである。）

foreignData.flavorText:
"Jogue os corpos fora. Eles vão ser só peso morto."
— Rolf, mecânico argiviano
foreignData.name: Reparar e Recarregar
foreignData.text: Devolva o card alvo de artefato, encantamento ou planeswalker de seu cemitério para o campo de batalha. Crie uma ficha de Pedra de Energia virada. (Ela é um artefato com "{T}: Adicione {C}. Este mana não pode ser gasto para conjurar uma mágica não de artefato".)

foreignData.flavorText:
「把遗体都抛出去。他们只会徒增重量。」
～阿基夫技师罗尔夫
foreignData.name: 整修充能
foreignData.text: 将目标神器，结界或鹏洛客牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。派出一个已横置的魔力石衍生物。（它是具有「{T}：加{C}。此法术力不能用来施放非神器咒语」的神器。）

name: Repair and Recharge
originalText: Return target artifact, enchantment, or planeswalker card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")

rulings.text: Powerstone tokens are a kind of predefined token. Each one has the artifact subtype “Powerstone” and the ability “{T}: Add {C}. This mana can’t be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.”

You can use the {C} added by a Powerstone token on anything that isn’t a nonartifact spell. This includes paying costs to activate abilities of both artifact and nonartifact permanents, paying ward costs, and so on.

Although all the cards in The Brothers’ War that create Powerstone tokens create a tapped Powerstone token, entering the battlefield tapped isn’t part of the token’s definition. Notably, if you create a token that is a copy of a Powerstone token, the token copy won’t enter the battlefield tapped.

text: Return target artifact, enchantment, or planeswalker card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")
